register_seo_description: Sign Up to Stocknear to become part of the largest trading community in the world.
register_subtitle: Create an account & start your stock analysis
register_terms_prefix: By registering you agree to Stocknear's
register_terms_middle: and acknowledge that you've read our
register_toast_success: Registration successful! Please check your email to verify your account.
register_toast_invalid: Registration failed. Please check your details and try again.
register_toast_email_exists: This email is already registered. Please sign in instead.
register_toast_disposable_email: Disposable email addresses are not allowed. Please use a permanent email.
register_toast_password_mismatch: Passwords do not match. Please try again.
register_toast_weak_password: Password is too weak. Use at least 8 characters with letters, numbers, and special characters.
register_toast_invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
register_toast_rate_limited: Too many registration attempts. Please try again in {minutes} minutes.
